thread.title: Vantage Deluxe World Travel Among Magellan's Best Of 2015
thread.title_full: Vantage Deluxe World Travel Among Magellan's Best Of 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Vantage Deluxe World Travel Among Magellan's Best Of 2015
text:
Vantage Deluxe World Travel
For The Second Year In A Row Vantage Cruise Line Selected As Silver Magellan Award Winner
BOSTON , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Vantage Deluxe World Travel is once again the recipient of Travel Weekly's Silver Magellan Award in the River Cruising category. Vantage is a world acclaimed tour operator known for providing the best values in deluxe travel across the globe. The company owns and operates its own fleet of choice river ships, and also offers top-line escorted land tours and small ship cruises in Europe , South America , Antarctica , and beyond.
Entries for the 2015 Magellan Awards were submitted from the most competitive travel organizations and professionals worldwide. Entries are judged and overseen by a panel of top travel professionals representing the best names and most accomplished leaders from the industry. The honor represents achieving one of the highest standards of excellence in global travel.
"The continued recognition in this category reflects our standards of always providing our guests with luxury experiences for the best value in world class travel. Our river cruises are a place where convenience and first-class experiences meet on the water and our passengers' cultural experiences are enhanced at every destination," said Ron Doyle , Chief Marketing Officer. "We're honored to once again be looked upon as one of the most creative and inspired travel experiences in the industry."
As Vantage looks to the future of travel, the introduction of new itineraries to destinations such as Cuba and Seychelles and the addition of a new river ship in 2016 will provide passengers with more Vantage premium experiences.
To explore Vantage Deluxe World Travel's award-winning river cruises visit: https://www.vantagetravel.com . For more information on the awards, please visit www.travelweeklyawards.com .
About Vantage Deluxe World Travel:
Vantage Deluxe World Travel is a world-renowned deluxe tour operator known for delivering the best values in deluxe land, river, and small ship travel. The company owns and operates its own fleet of luxurious river cruise ships that sail the Rhine, Danube, Main, Moselle, Seine, Saone and Rhone rivers; and also exclusively charters ships in Europe , Asia , and South America . Vantage's Discoveries brand offers deluxe land and small ship journeys in North and South America , Africa , Europe and the Mediterranean, Asia , and the South Pacific. For information visit www.vantagetravel.com .
About Travel Weekly
Travel Weekly is the most influential provider of news, research, opinion and analysis to the North American travel trade marketplace. In addition to a weekly print publication, TravelWeekly.com - updated several times daily - is the most-visited industry website. Travel Weekly is a division of Secaucus, New Jersey -based Northstar Travel Media, the largest business-to-business travel publisher in the world.
www.travelweekly.com
